params.decayConstant: Precomputed constant that allows us to rewrite a pow() as an exp().
params.min: minimum price to be paid for a token, scaled by 1e18
params.sold: The total number of products sold so far.
params.targetPrice: The target price for a product if sold on pace, scaled by 1e18.
params.timeFactor: Time-dependent factor used to calculate target sale time.
params.timeSinceStart: Time passed since the VRGDA began, scaled by 1e18.

returns.price: of product * quantity according to VRGDA, scaled by 1e18.

getTargetSaleTime(int256,int256).details: Given a number of products sold, return the target time that number of products should be sold by.

params.sold: A number of products sold, scaled by 1e18, to get the corresponding target sale time for.
params.timeFactor: Time-dependent factor used to calculate target sale time.

returns._0: The target time the products should be sold by, scaled by 1e18, where the time is relative, such that 0 means the products should be sold immediately when the VRGDA begins.

params.decayConstant: Precomputed constant that allows us to rewrite a pow() as an exp().
params.min: minimum price to be paid for a token, scaled by 1e18
params.sold: The total number of products sold so far.
params.targetPrice: The target price for a product if sold on pace, scaled by 1e18.
params.timeFactor: Time-dependent factor used to calculate target sale time.
params.timeSinceStart: Time passed since the VRGDA began, scaled by 1e18.

returns._0: The price of a product according to VRGDA, scaled by 1e18.

params.productId: ID of the product being queried
params.slicerId: ID of the slicer being queried

params.currencies: currencies of the product to set the price params for.
params.priceDecayPercent: The percent price decays per unit of time with no sales, scaled by 1e18.
params.productId: ID of the product to set the price params for.
params.slicerId: ID of the slicer to set the price params for.

getAdjustedVRGDAPrice(int256,int256,int2.notice: Get product price adjusted to quantity purchased.

getVRGDAPrice(int256,int256,int256,uint2.notice: Calculate the price of a product according to the VRGDA formula.

productPrice(uint256,uint256,address,uin.notice: Function called by Slice protocol to calculate current product price.
